page.title: 04PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: We telephoned seven members of the {parish council.}We found out that they are choosing a new governor from Frettenham . They are going to permit building on Spixworth mushroom farm. All of them said it was a very enjoyable.They work up to thirty hours a week or sometimes not even an hour per day. The workings of the parish council are that they plan everything,they can employ people and they make sure the streets are clean . You have to live in the village to be picked for the parish council ; if one person retires from the parish council then they pick a new councillor.There are twelve people on the parish council.
